sentences.en: After shampooing, always rinse the hair several times in clear water.
sentences.cn: 每次用完洗发剂后都要用清水将头发冲洗几次。

sentences.en: He didn't just command. He personally fought in several heavy battles.
sentences.cn: 他不仅仅发号施令，还身先士卒参加了几次激战。

sentences.en: He entered for many competitions, winning several gold medals.
sentences.cn: 他参加过多次比赛，赢得了数枚金牌。

sentences.en: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
sentences.cn: 他被撞见拼命想要解开几盘缠在一起的胶卷。

sentences.en: I am expecting several important letters but nothing has arrived.
sentences.cn: 我正在等几封重要的信件，可是一封都没到。

sentences.en: I have several methods.
sentences.cn: 我有几个方法。

sentences.en: I have several reasons to support my view.
sentences.cn: 我有几个理由来支持我的观点。

sentences.en: I have several suggestions.
sentences.cn: 我有几个建议。

sentences.en: Over the years several similar theories have been put forward.
sentences.cn: 几年来已经有好几个类似理论相继提出。

sentences.en: Prices at three-star hotels fell furthest in several northern cities.
sentences.cn: 3星级宾馆的住宿价格在几个北方城市降得最多。

sentences.en: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month.
sentences.cn: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。

sentences.en: Several of the delays were caused by the new high-tech baggage system.
sentences.cn: 几次延误都是由新的高科技行李传送系统造成的。

sentences.en: Several proposals are under consideration by the state assembly.
sentences.cn: 有几个提案州议会正在讨论中。

sentences.en: She travels con-stantly, moving among her several residences around the world.
sentences.cn: 她经常旅行，穿梭于她在世界各地的多处住所。

sentences.en: That was the cue for several months of intense bargaining.
sentences.cn: 那意味着几个月的激烈谈判开始了。

sentences.en: The integrated country will rend into several independent regions sooner or later.
sentences.cn: 那个完整的国家早晚会分裂成几个独立的地区。

sentences.en: The mixture can be used as a gargle several times a day.
sentences.cn: 每天可用这种混合液漱几次口。

sentences.en: The teacher lunched several students at his home.
sentences.cn: 老师请几个学生在他家吃午饭。

sentences.en: They shook hands and went their several ways (= went in different directions ) .
sentences.cn: 他们握了握手便各自走了。

sentences.en: Traffic into London on the M11 was backed up for several miles.
sentences.cn: 进入伦敦的车辆在11号高速公路上堵了好几英里。

sentences.en: We export tractors from the East Coast to several African countries.
sentences.cn: 我们从东海岸向好几个非洲国家出口拖拉机。

sentences.en: We felt we were living life on several different planes.
sentences.cn: 我们感到大家生活的精神层次各不相同。

trans.tran_en: a number of people or things that is more than a few, but not a lot
